column2: All Quiet On The Western Front
column3: All Quiet On The Western Front

column2: All right, Commander, we've been tasked with defending this installation.
column3: All right, Commander, we've been tasked with defending this installation.

column2: We have scattered reports of incoming hostiles from multiple directions.
column3: We have scattered reports of incoming hostiles from multiple directions.

column2: They'll be targeting the structures; intercept them before they bring any down. Good luck.
column3: They'll be targeting the structures; intercept them before they bring any down. Good luck.

column2: Excellent work, Commander - the hostiles are clear and our facility is secure.
column3: Excellent work, Commander - the hostiles are clear and our facility is secure.

column2: It's no good, Commander. Stand by for extraction and we'll get you out of there.
column3: It's no good, Commander. Stand by for extraction and we'll get you out of there.

column2: We're in position! All engineers have disembarked from the Personal carriers. The APCs will scatter and support you, keep the Turrets online and we'll keep firing.
column3: We're in position! All engineers have disembarked from the Personal carriers. The APCs will scatter and support you, keep the Turrets online and we'll keep firing.

column2: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
column3: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

column2: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
column3: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.

column2: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
column3: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.

column2: Commander, we're down to just one building left. If they bring it down, this mission is over.
column3: Commander, we're down to just one building left. If they bring it down, this mission is over.

column2: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
column3: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.

column2: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
column3: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.

column2: They have point defenses set up around the base, they are however offline.
column3: They have point defenses set up around the base, they are however offline.

column2: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
column3: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.

column2: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good Luck!
column3: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good Luck!

column2: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facility must be running on incredibly narrow margins if they can't afford to protect it themselves. Anyway, Commander, this should be very straightforward.
column3: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facility must be running on incredibly narrow margins if they can't afford to protect it themselves. Anyway, Commander, this should be very straightforward.

column2: Baddies Inbound
column3: Baddies Inbound

column2: Hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have been making increasingly bold incursions toward one of our processing facilities on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. This facility represents a substantial cash investment for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}, and its destruction would be both politically and financially disastrous. We need a capable mercenary company to defend the site. Payment will be remitted upon the repulsion of all hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units.
column3: Hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have been making increasingly bold incursions toward one of our processing facilities on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. This facility represents a substantial cash investment for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}, and its destruction would be both politically and financially disastrous. We need a capable mercenary company to defend the site. Payment will be remitted upon the repulsion of all hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units.

column2: Foreclosure
column3: Foreclosure

column2: There's something I still don't get, XO. Why did they abandon this place if it's full of stuff valuable enough that they're willing to flatten the place to keep it out of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} hands?
column3: There's something I still don't get, XO. Why did they abandon this place if it's full of stuff valuable enough that they're willing to flatten the place to keep it out of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} hands?

column2: No clue. At a guess? It's a trap, and we're springing it.
column3: No clue. At a guess? It's a trap, and we're springing it.

column2: One moment; if we know it's a trap, why are we walking into it?
column3: One moment; if we know it's a trap, why are we walking into it?

column2: Hah! Because they're paying us to.
column3: Hah! Because they're paying us to.

column2: Got it in one, Yang. We're going to turn a handful of 'Mechs into scrap and loot the remains; the specific details aren't really our problem.
column3: Got it in one, Yang. We're going to turn a handful of 'Mechs into scrap and loot the remains; the specific details aren't really our problem.

column2: I hope whatever they found in there was worth it.
column3: I hope whatever they found in there was worth it.

column2: It was worth it to us, Dr. Murad.
column3: It was worth it to us, Dr. Murad.

column2: What a damn disaster. Let's debrief back in orbit.
column3: What a damn disaster. Let's debrief back in orbit.

column2: Our covert operatives on the planet have located a secret {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility that's been abandoned. We have a team inbound to this planet to strip the facility of everything valuable, but our people on the surface tripped some sort of alarm, which means the original owners are probably on their way to level the place and ensure we can't salvage anything. We need you and your people to occupy that base and keep it intact until our team arrives.

column2: Maybe this will be a quiet contract for once--

column2: Scratch that, Commander. Orbital imagery is showing multiple incoming hostile contacts.

column2: Buckle up, Commander. This is going to get exciting.
column3: Buckle up, Commander. This is going to get exciting.

column2: Excellent work, Commander. A bit more action than advertised, but that's why they pay us the big C-Bills.
column3: Excellent work, Commander. A bit more action than advertised, but that's why they pay us the big C-Bills.

column2: Well, that didn't go as planned; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} can blame their poor intel.

column2: Military force has been authorized against your facility. Withdraw immediately or be destroyed.

column2: I suppose that doesn't leave a lot of room for negotiations.

column2: Commander, the weapons are safely away. We're done here.

column2: Dammit. We're going to have to withdraw, Commander.

column3: That's almost all the storage buildings down, Commander. If we lose another, our employers won't get any of their guns out of here.

column2: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
column3: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.

column2: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
column3: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.

column2: They have point defenses set up around the base, they are however offline.
column3: They have point defenses set up around the base, they are however offline.

column2: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
column3: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.

column2: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good Luck!
column3: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good Luck!

column2: I can't imagine any use for those guns in this system that isn't bad, but I suppose that's to be expected.
column3: I can't imagine any use for those guns in this system that isn't bad, but I suppose that's to be expected.

column2: Baddies Inbound
column3: Baddies Inbound

column2: Somehow, the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities have discovered one of our storehouses. If it were just drugs or stolen goods, we'd let them seize it and write it off as a loss. But it's a weapons stockpile, and those damn things are hard to move from one system to another. We'd like you to protect our guns while our people load them onto transports and we evacuate them.
column3: Somehow, the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities have discovered one of our storehouses. If it were just drugs or stolen goods, we'd let them seize it and write it off as a loss. But it's a weapons stockpile, and those damn things are hard to move from one system to another. We'd like you to protect our guns while our people load them onto transports and we evacuate them.

column2: Titan Attack
column3: Titan Attack

column2: Meyer, are you picking up that assault 'Mech they said would be here?
column3: Meyer, are you picking up that assault 'Mech they said would be here?

column2: No, I'm-- wait, there it is. Shit, that's big. How the hell are we supposed to keep that from blowing shit up?
column3: No, I'm-- wait, there it is. Shit, that's big. How the hell are we supposed to keep that from blowing shit up?

column2: Engage it and keep it firing at our people, instead of the buildings.
column3: Engage it and keep it firing at our people, instead of the buildings.

column2: I just wanna go on the record here: that's a terrible plan, and you're going to break my 'Mechs.
column3: I just wanna go on the record here: that's a terrible plan, and you're going to break my 'Mechs.

column2: I'm not happy with this, boss. It could have been worse, but let's not take contracts where you use my 'Mechs as punching bags?
column3: I'm not happy with this, boss. It could have been worse, but let's not take contracts where you use my 'Mechs as punching bags?

column2: Noted, Yang.
column3: Noted, Yang.

column2: Yang, you do realize that getting shot at is... kinda part of the job description?
column3: Yang, you do realize that getting shot at is... kinda part of the job description?

column2: What a damn disaster. Let's debrief back in orbit.
column3: What a damn disaster. Let's debrief back in orbit.

column2: Argo, my engineers are powering the turrets up now. The APCs will scatter and provide support.
column3: Argo, my engineers are powering the turrets up now. The APCs will scatter and provide support.

column2: Roger, local command. Commander, looks like we have a few more guns on our side.
column3: Roger, local command. Commander, looks like we have a few more guns on our side.

column2: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
column3: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

column2: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
column3: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.

column2: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
column3: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.

column2: Commander, there's only one target structure left. If we lose it, we've blown the contract. You have to draw their fire somehow.
column3: Commander, there's only one target structure left. If we lose it, we've blown the contract. You have to draw their fire somehow.

column2: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
column3: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.

column2: Argo, this is {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} local command. Our turrets have been disabled by sabotage.
column3: Argo, this is {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} local command. Our turrets have been disabled by sabotage.

column2: Well now there's a surprise.
column3: Well now there's a surprise.

column2: That's going to make this mission rough, command. Suggestions?
column3: That's going to make this mission rough, command. Suggestions?

column2: I have a team of engineers that can manually restart the turrets, but that can only be done in person at turret control.
column3: I have a team of engineers that can manually restart the turrets, but that can only be done in person at turret control.

column2: Roger. Commander, if we want any backup, we'll need to keep those APCs alive until they get to the turret control building.
column3: Roger. Commander, if we want any backup, we'll need to keep those APCs alive until they get to the turret control building.

column2: We're going to try to keep an assault 'Mech from destroying a facility, without any ground intel. This seems like a really terrible idea, Commander.
column3: We're going to try to keep an assault 'Mech from destroying a facility, without any ground intel. This seems like a really terrible idea, Commander.

column2: We have an urgent assignment that we'd like your assistance with, Commander. We have a secret listening post here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and we've just learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} agents have discovered the base's location. We need time to transmit all the data we've gathered to a DropShip in orbit, but they're already advancing on the facility. Worse, we're detecting an engine signature from an assault-class 'Mech closing on the base's location. We need you to drop immediately and protect that base until we can get the data transmitted.
column3: We have an urgent assignment that we'd like your assistance with, Commander. Worse, we're detecting an engine signature from an assault-class 'Mech closing on the base's location. We need you to drop immediately and protect that base until we can get the data transmitted.

column2: Engage it and keep it--
column3: Engage it and keep it--

column2: Uh, Darius? You're not gonna like this. I'm detecting two assault engine signatures.
column3: Uh, Darius? You're not gonna like this. I'm detecting two assault engine signatures.

column2: You gotta be kidding me.
column3: You gotta be kidding me.

column2: Holy shit, Commander. Let's not do that again any time soon?
column3: Holy shit, Commander. Let's not do that again any time soon?

column2: It worked out in the end. Somehow.

column2: Vanguard
column3: Vanguard

column2: Commander it looks like this babysitting job may be heating up.
column3: Commander it looks like this babysitting job may be heating up.

column2: We're picking up a large increase in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} comm chatter.
column3: We're picking up a large increase in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} comm chatter.

column2: I suggest you power up your mechs and get ready.
column3: I suggest you power up your mechs and get ready.

column2: The base is secure. Hopefully {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} can hold it themselves, now.
column3: The base is secure. Hopefully {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} can hold it themselves, now.

column2: These losses are too heavy Commander, we've failed.
column3: These losses are too heavy Commander, we've failed.

column2: They're in! The turrets are coming online.
column3: They're in! The turrets are coming online.

column2: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
column3: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

column2: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
column3: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.

column2: Commander, we lost a building!
column3: Commander, we lost a building!

column2: Only one building still standing, Commander. We're cutting it awfully close, here.
column3: Only one building still standing, Commander. We're cutting it awfully close, here.

column2: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
column3: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.

column2: Commander, one of our lances was hit on the way to the facility and has suffered 50% losses.
column3: Commander, one of our lances was hit on the way to the facility and has suffered 50% losses.

column2: You must enure that the survivors reach the facility.
column3: You must enure that the survivors reach the facility.

column2: They're carrying the hardware activation keys for the base turrets.
column3: They're carrying the hardware activation keys for the base turrets.

column2: Commander, if they're hiring mercs to babysit when their forces are less than a day away they expect trouble. Rumors say {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are in the area, they could present a threat.

column2: We have a small disused base in a remote part of {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. We need it and are preparing to reactivate it. We'd like to hire you to recon the facility and defend it until our forces can move in. We'll have a lance with you in half a day and a logistics team within 24 hours.
column3: We have a small disused base in a remote part of {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. We need it and are preparing to reactivate it. We'd like to hire you to recon the facility and defend it until our forces can move in. We'll have a lance with you in half a day and a logistics team within 24 hours.
